item.description:
@yugioh101 wrote:

i cant see it cause im to dumb

if (useItemID == 3827 && useItemID == 3839) { if (playerHasItemAmount(getItemSlot(3827), 1)) { if (playerHasItemAmount(getItemSlot(3828), 1)) { if (playerHasItemAmount(getItemSlot(3829), 1)) { if (playerHasItemAmount(getItemSlot(3830), 1)) { deleteItem(3839, getItemSlot(3839), 1); deleteItem(3827, getItemSlot(3827), 1); deleteItem(3828, getItemSlot(3828), 1); deleteItem(3829, getItemSlot(3829), 1); deleteItem(3830, getItemSlot(3830), 1); addItem(3840, 1); } } } } }
